Class LambdaRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.protocols.lambda.LambdaRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.amazonaws.services.lambda.runtime.RequestStreamHandler, com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component, com.telenav.kivakit.component.ComponentMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.configuration.lookup.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.configuration.settings.SettingsTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.mixin.Mixin, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.paths.PackagePathTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.traits.LanguageTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.traits.TryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.repeaters.RepeaterMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.resource.ResourceTrait
public class LambdaRequestHandler extends Object implements com.amazonaws.services.lambda.runtime.RequestStreamHandler, com.telenav.kivakit.component.ComponentMixin

The KivaKit generic Amazon Web Service (AWS) Lambda request handler.

Configuration

This request handler should be specified as follows when installing a Microservice Lambda jar: 

com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.protocols.lambda.LambdaRequestHandler::handleRequest

Security

This request handler can handle any MicroservletRequest once it has been exposed by a call to MicroserviceLambdaService.mount(String, Version, Class). Only explicitly exposed Lambda methods can be executed Lambda RequestStreamHandler.

Logging

Note that the KivaKit logging methods are redirected to the AWS logger provided by Context.getLogger(). This allows existing error reporting in request handlers to be seen on AWS.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
LambdaFunction, MicroserviceLambdaService
